resources.string: Welcome to my Android mobile app.
Hello! My name is Jiemin, and I am a die-hard mobile developer.
I have a bachelor degree in CS and a Master degree in ECE in Michigan. I was both TA and RA during my graduate school time.
I am master in C and Java, especially Android. Familiar with whole mobile app development process, app structure and details to implement functionalities.
Again, welcome to my mobile app and you can check those subsections on the left for details.
